import React, { useRef, useForm } from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import { v4 as uuidV4 } from 'uuid'; import {WelcomeButton} from '../index' import './loginForm.scss' export default function Login({onFormSwitch, onEmailSubmit, onPasswordSubmit}) { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() onEmailSubmit(emailRef.current.value) onPasswordSubmit(passwordRef.current.value) } function router(pages){ onFormSwitch = pages } return (

Sign Up

Forgot Password?
); };
